data.question: What is the chemical formula for scandium terephthalate MOF?
What hydrostatic medium was used in the high-pressure experiments on Sc2BDC3?
At what pressure does Sc2BDC3 undergo amorphization in Fluorinert FC-77?
Is the amorphization of Sc2BDC3 in Fluorinert FC-77 reversible upon pressure release?
How does the unit cell volume of Sc2BDC3 change upon immersion in methanol without added pressure?
What happens to Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 when compressed in Fluorinert FC-77 to 0.8 GPa?
data.answer: It undergoes a phase transition from C2/c to Fdd2

data.question: Does Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 undergo amorphization in Fluorinert FC-77?
What is the effect of methanol on the compressibility of Sc2BDC3?
data.answer: Methanol inclusion stabilizes the framework against amorphization

data.question: At what pressure does Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 in methanol start to show a rapid decrease in diffraction resolution?
Is the crystalline-to-amorphous phase transition observed in Sc2BDC3 in Fluorinert FC-77 accompanied by a color change?
What computational method was used to study methanol adsorption in Sc2BDC3?
Does the presence of methanol affect the phase transition pressure of Sc2(NO2-BDC)3?
data.answer: Yes, methanol uptake inhibits the phase transition

data.question: What is the role of methanol in the structural stability of Sc2BDC3 under pressure?
data.answer: Methanol molecules enter the pores and stabilize the structure

data.question: What is the symmetry change observed in Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 under pressure in Fluorinert FC-77?
Can Sc2BDC3 adsorb methanol molecules at ambient pressure?
What happens to the unit cell dimensions of Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 when compressed in methanol?
data.answer: The a-axis increases slightly, while the b- and c-axes decrease

data.question: Is the amorphization of Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 in Fluorinert FC-77 reversible?
What force field was used for scandium in the computational studies of Sc2BDC3?
What is the maximum pressure at which Sc2BDC3 remains crystalline in methanol?
Does the presence of methanol prevent the amorphization of Sc2(NO2-BDC)3 at high pressures?
data.answer: Yes, methanol inclusion stabilizes the framework
